# cgd-creator

Create Clarity-Gated Documents (`.cgd`) with epistemic markers for safe LLM ingestion.

[![PyPI version](https://badge.fury.io/py/cgd-creator.svg)](https://pypi.org/project/cgd-creator/)
[![License: CC BY 4.0](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-CC_BY_4.0-lightgrey.svg)](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/)

## Status: Coming Soon

This package is part of the [Clarity Gate](https://github.com/frmoretto/clarity-gate) ecosystem for epistemic quality verification.

**Functionality is under development.**

## What Will This Do?

`cgd-creator` will help you create properly annotated Clarity-Gated Documents with:
- Inline epistemic markers for uncertainty
- HITL verification tracking
- Exclusion blocks for non-ingestable content
- Automatic validation against CGD format spec

## Related Packages

- [cgd-validator](https://pypi.org/project/cgd-validator/) - Validate existing .cgd files
- [sot-validator](https://pypi.org/project/sot-validator/) - Validate .sot files
- [sot-creator](https://pypi.org/project/sot-creator/) - Create .sot files

## File Format Specification

See [CGD_FORMAT.md](https://github.com/frmoretto/clarity-gate/blob/main/docs/CGD_FORMAT.md) for the complete format specification.
